# nacos_user (Data Source)

Nacos user data source

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "nacos_user" "example" {
  username = "example_user"
}

output "user_details" {
  value = data.nacos_user.example
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `username` (String) Name of the user

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) ID of the user (same as username).
